title: Berkshire Hathaway fourth-quarter operating earnings fall 8%, cash hoard swells to nearly $130 billion
description: Berkshire Hathaway's operating earnings totaled $6.7 billion in the fourth quarter of 2022, a release read Saturday.

title: Warren Buffett calls stock buyback critics 'economic illiterate' in Berkshire Hathaway annual letter
description: Buffett released his much-anticipated missive on Saturday.

title: Nokia launches smartphone you can fix yourself, jumping on 'right to repair' trend
description: Smartphone companies are increasingly working to make phones last for longer amid pressure from regulators to make electronics devices more sustainable.
